life.birthDateDrawerIntro: Hello there! Please enter your birth date.
life.birthDateDrawerResult: You are {{age}} {{yearsWord}} old. You were born on a {{weekday}}.
life.birthDateDrawerStats: It happened {{months}} {{monthsWord}} ago, that's about {{weeks}} {{weeksWord}} or {{days}} {{daysWord}}. You have probably slept about {{sleepHours}} {{hoursWord}}!
life.birthDateDrawerLifeExpectancy: Most people live about 60 years. Some live longer, but most don't reach 90.
life.birthDateDrawer90YearsSleep: You will spend 30 out of 90 years sleeping. So what do these 90 years look like — 4696 weeks? It seems like a lot — or maybe not.
life.birthDateDrawerLongLiverGoal: So your current goal is {{lifeExpectancy}} years. And how do these {{lifeExpectancy}} years look like — {{expectancyWeeks}} {{weeksWord}}?
life.lifeExpectancyDrawerDateResult: The expected life span is {{lifeExpectancyYears}} {{lifeExpectancyYearsWord}} {{lifeExpectancyMonths}} {{lifeExpectancyMonthsWord}}{{lifeExpectancyDaysString}}, which contains {{weeks}} {{weeksWord}}.
life.newLifeExpectancy: With a new life expectancy, your calendar will also change
